languages.text: По команде мы достали ауспексы и начали наступление. Мы доверили наши жизни маленьким зеленым вид-скринам и их машинным духам.

traits.locale_text: По команде мы достали ауспексы и начали наступление. Мы доверили наши жизни маленьким зеленым экранчикам и их машинным духам.

languages.text: We were commanded to prepare our auspexes and commence the assault. We consigned our lives to small green vid-screens and their machine spirits.
languages.original_text: По команде мы достали ауспексы и начали наступление. Мы доверили наши жизни маленьким зеленым вид-скринам и их машинным духам.

traits.locale_text: We were commanded to prepare our auspexes and commence the assault. We consigned our lives to small green vid-screens and their machine spirits.
We were commanded to prepare our auspexes and commence the assault. We consigned our lives to small green vid-screens and their machine spirits.
We were commanded to prepare our auspexes and commence the assault. We consigned our lives to small green vid-screens and their machine spirits.
We were commanded to prepare our auspexes and commence the assault. We consigned our lives to small green vid-screens and their machine spirits.
We were commanded to prepare our auspexes and commence the assault. We consigned our lives to small green vid-screens and their machine spirits.
We were commanded to prepare our auspexes and commence the assault. We consigned our lives to small green vid-screens and their machine spirits.

languages.text: 我们收到命令，做好准备，开始进攻。我们把身家性命全权交付给了那些绿色的小屏幕，以及它们的机魂。
languages.original_text: We were commanded to prepare our auspexes and commence the assault. We consigned our lives to small green vid-screens and their machine spirits.

traits.locale_text: 我们收到命令，做好准备，开始进攻。我们把身家性命全权交付给了那些绿色的小屏幕，以及它们的机魂。

languages.text: Nous avons reçu l'ordre de préparer nos auspex et de donner l'assaut. Nous avons confié nos vies à de petits écrans verts et à leurs esprits de la machine.
languages.original_text: We were commanded to prepare our auspexes and commence the assault. We consigned our lives to small green vid-screens and their machine spirits.

traits.locale_text: Nous avons reçu l'ordre de préparer nos auspex et de donner l'assaut. Nous avons confié nos vies à de petits écrans verts et à leurs esprits de la machine.

languages.text: 我々はアウスペクスを準備し、攻撃を開始するよう命じられた。自分たちの命を小さな緑の画面とその中の機械精霊に委ねた。
languages.original_text: We were commanded to prepare our auspexes and commence the assault. We consigned our lives to small green vid-screens and their machine spirits.

traits.locale_text: 我々はアウスペクスを準備し、攻撃を開始するよう命じられた。自分たちの命を小さな緑の画面とその中の機械精霊に委ねた。

languages.text: Recibimos órdenes de preparar nuestros auspexes e iniciar el asalto. Encomendamos nuestras vidas a unas pantallas de vídeo verdes y pequeñas y a los espíritus máquina que albergaban.
languages.original_text: We were commanded to prepare our auspexes and commence the assault. We consigned our lives to small green vid-screens and their machine spirits.

traits.locale_text: Recibimos órdenes de preparar nuestros auspexes e iniciar el asalto. Encomendamos nuestras vidas a unas pantallas de vídeo verdes y pequeñas y a los espíritus máquina que albergaban.

languages.text: Wir erhielten Befehl, unsere Auspizien vorzubereiten und den Angriff zu beginnen. Wir übergaben unsere Leben kleinen grünen Vid-Bildschirmen und ihren Maschinengeistern.
languages.original_text: We were commanded to prepare our auspexes and commence the assault. We consigned our lives to small green vid-screens and their machine spirits.

traits.locale_text: Wir erhielten Befehl, unsere Auspizien vorzubereiten und den Angriff zu beginnen. Wir übergaben unsere Leben kleinen grünen Vid-Bildschirmen und ihren Maschinengeistern.

languages.text: Uzgörenlerimizi hazırlayarak taarruzu başlatmamız emredildi. Hayatımızı, yeşil video ekranlarına ve makine ruhlarına emanet ettik.
languages.original_text: We were commanded to prepare our auspexes and commence the assault. We consigned our lives to small green vid-screens and their machine spirits.
